OrgName: Agero, Inc. (f/k/a Cross Country Automotive Services) and its subsidiaries, including Agero Connected Services, Inc. (f/k/a ATX Group) (collectively, ”Agero”)
activities: Agero, Inc. (f/k/a Cross Country Automotive Services) and its subsidiaries, including Agero Connected Services, Inc. (f/k/a ATX Group) (collectively, ”Agero”); is a provider of telematics (or connected vehicle) , roadside assistance and claims management servcices to the automobile manufacturing and automobile insurance industries.  The company collects certain personal information about its employees in the European Economic Area (EEA).  Agero processes sensitive information about the company's employees to the extent necessary or appropriate for compliance with relevant legal or contractual obligations, including managing attendance and employee records.
contacttitle1: Vice President, Corporate Relations, Privacy Officer
recoursemech: European Union and Swiss data protection authorities
